main event: On 14 August 1958, a witness observed a star-shaped, blue-white object the size of a dime traveling East to West with a sharp right angle turn to North before disappearing.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for only 10 seconds,The object made an abrupt rise and vanished from sight,The conditions included haze and thunderstorms at the time,The witness claims to have reported other phenomena previously,The conclusion of the report suggested it was likely an aircraft.
